title: Black & Decker 12 Cup Stainless Coffee Maker with Vortex Technology
features: Vortex water flow- rich saturation and optimal water flow creating maximum flavour
Sneak-a-cup- fill your cup before brewing ends
Keep warm function with Brew Freshness Time- lets your know how long the coffee has been kept warm
Digital controls with brew strength selector and Auto Clean system
Duralife glass carafe and nonstick keep hot carafe plate
Removable filter baskets are dishwasher safe
Premium stainless steel exterior is durable and looks at home in any kitchen
description: Brew coffee just the way you like it. This 12-cup* coffeemaker features VORTEX™ Technology, which evenly saturates coffee grounds for full and rich flavor extraction using optimal water temperatures. You can change the brew strength with the option for a slower brewing process and stronger cup of coffee. Set how long you want to keep coffee warm after brewing with the adjustable keep warm timer (options for 30, 60, 90, 120 min, and OFF). Sneak-A-Cup™ Technology lets you pour a cup of coffee before the rest of the pot has brewed--all without any drips or spills. Other useful features include: Smart-Clean automatic cleaning cycle, 12-cup* Duralife™ glass carafe, washable brew basket, and “Keep Hot” heated carafe plate to make sure coffee is hot when you’re ready to drink it
